statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_habits FROM customers WHERE behavior_segment = 'VIP'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE purchase_habits LIKE '%weekly%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT behavior_segment, COUNT(*) FROM customers GROUP BY behavior_segment
SELECT customer_name, behavior_segment FROM customers WHERE purchase_habits='Frequent Shopper';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_habits FROM customers WHERE behavior_segment='New Customer' AND purchase_habits LIKE 'Super%';
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customers WHERE behavior_segment='Returning Customer';
SELECT customer_name, behavior_segment, purchase_habits FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_behavior IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_behavior LIKE '%loyal%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_date, product_name, product_category FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_date, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation
SELECT name, behavior_category FROM CustomerSegmentation ORDER BY behavior_category ASC
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM BehaviorPatterns WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM PurchasingHistory WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT name, purchasing_habits FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE behavior_category = 'High Value' ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, purchasing_habits FROM CustomerSegmentation AS CS JOIN PurchasingHistory AS PH ON CS.customer_id = PH.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM BehaviorPatterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;

SELECT name, purchasing_habits, purchase_date FROM CustomerSegmentation AS CS JOIN PurchasingHistory AS PH ON CS.customer_id = PH.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT CS.name, PH.total_amount FROM CustomerSegmentation AS CS JOIN PurchasingHistory AS PH ON CS.customer_id = PH.customer_id WHERE PH.total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY PH.total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_behavior_score FROM customers ORDER BY customer_behavior_score ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date, total_price FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE total_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT c.name, p.name AS product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pr.amount < 500
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS product_price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pc ON c.customer_id = pc.customer_id JOIN products p ON pc.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT cs.segment_name, COUNT(cb.behavior_id) AS total_behaviors FROM customer_segments cs LEFT JOIN customer_behavior cb ON cs.segment_id = cb.customer_id GROUP BY cs.segment_name ORDER BY total_behaviors DESC;
